attributes.action: Stop the government having the right to break the law. By changing contracts.
attributes.additional_details: A reference is the doctors contracts being changed to suit the government. If they want to Change a contract it should be with new employees not the ones who have already signed a contract
attributes.background: What gives the government the right to change a contract. Does it mean now a contract is no longer a contract. If it can be changed to suit.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to legislate to ensure government contracts can't be changed once they have been signed.
